cta.subtitle: Fulfill your calling to make disciples of Jesus
cta.title: Download the Waha Discovery bible study app

hero.subtitle: Easily facilitate a Discovery Bible Study or Disciple Making Training
hero.title: Just press play & discuss to start discovering God

step_1.description: Invite a group of (2 or more) friends or family members to study God’s word with you in your living room, park, or a cafe.
step_1.title: Gather

step_2.description: The app will facilitate the entire meeting for your group. Whenever a question is asked, simply pause the audio and discuss it.
step_2.title: Press Play

step_3.description: Waha will never tell you what to believe, we simply allow you to read scripture for yourself and to apply God’s truths to your life!
step_3.title: Discover

how_it_works.subtitle: With the Waha App, you can easily invite your friends to join you in a Discovery Bible Study. The app facilitates the entire lesson for you, making it simple and convenient.
how_it_works.title: How it works
